title: when in communication, auto menu asks you to type a number like "press 1 for English" but nothing ha
content:
during communication, I get a menu asking to press a number like "press 1 for English" "press 2 for Nderlands" etc... When I press it is not recognized, and the menu starts over.
I got this issue for 2 different use case, 1 with outreach app, one with GGD amsterdam.
Therefore I think it's a phone problem. I updated last version
